src:
Radonjić: Ovakav Fenerbahče nam otežava posao
07 Nov 2019, 10:09 by Nemanja
Trener minhenskog Bajerna Dejan Radonjić istakao je da loša forma Fenerbahčea ne znači ništa pred sutrašnji međusobni duel dva tima u Evroligi.
Bivši strateg Crvene zvezde je istakao da njegov tim jedva čeka da se susretne sa bivšim košarkašem Derikom Vilijamsom koji od ove sezone nastupa za tim iz Istanbula.
 – Naravno da jedva čekamo da vidimo Vilijamsa, ali Fenerbahče je veoma talentovan tim i ne možemo se skoncentrisati samo na njega – rekao je Radonjić.
Fenerbahče igra ispod svih očekivanja u Evroligi ove sezone, čemu su doprinele silne povrede i slabe pripreme usled izostanka nekolicine igrača zbog Svetskog prvenstva.
 – Na nama je da odigramo bolje nego što smo odigrali prošle nedelje protiv Baskonije. Što se Fenera tiče, njihova sezona nije dobro počela, a nama to dodatno otežava situaciju. Biće silno motivisani – zaključio je Radonjić.
Meč između Fenerbahčea i Bajern Minhena na programu je sutra u ,,Ulker areni“ od 18.45 sati.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Radonjic: This kind of Fenerbahce makes our job difficult
07 Nov 2019, 09:09 by Nemanja
Bayern Munich coach Dejan Radonjic stressed that Fenerbahce's poor form means nothing before tomorrow's match between the two Euroleague teams.
The former Red Star strategist has pointed out that his team can't wait to meet former basketball player Derrick Williams, who has been playing for the Istanbul team since this season.
- Of course we can't wait to see Williams, but Fenerbahce is a very talented team and we can't concentrate on him alone, Radonjic said.
Fenerbahce is playing below all expectations in the Euroleague this season, which was compounded by a lot of injuries and poor preparation due to the lack of a few players due to the World Cup.
- It is up to us to play better than we did last week against Basque Country. As for Fener, their season did not start well, and this further complicates the situation. They will be very motivated - Radonjic concluded.
The match between Fenerbahce and Bayern Munich is on the program tomorrow at the Ulker Arena from 18.45.
